results.title: Badrinath ki Dulhania
results.content: badrinath bansal from jhansi vaidehi trivedi kota belong to small towns but have diametrically opposite opinions on everything. leads clash of ideologies, despite both them recognizing the goodness each other. making badri his dulhania ki varun dhawan alia bhatt when all heart & fiery come together, you get vaidehi. watch unplugged, talking about dulhania’s quirks, similarities differences their real selves. tamma 'method acting' if taking your role too seriously still fun with it was thing, leading pack! how followed ‘method acting’ for keeping up badri’s not so sober habits!

results.title: From Romantic Dramas to Fresh New Genres, How Bollywood has evolved
results.content: there was time, not long ago, when bollywood synonymous to romantic movies where protagonists danced around trees ran towards each other slow-mo, while the wind blew their hair dramatically. you know drill. weâ€™re saying didnâ€™t have any genre, we sure did. but somehow base theme of action, comedy, thriller, even sci-fi(mr.india, robot, krish) film always mushy love story. cut today, thereâ€™s classy raazi, andhadhun, stree, badhaai ho; massy sanju, padmaavat, simmba; everything between. romance may be completely out window just yet, it has surely gone from being supporting sidekick, ending happy one. progress! realism concept that taken far more seriously new age cinema than ever before. real-life stories historical events are transferred beautifully onto silver screen. also experimenting with different genres, trying test waters, audience definitely adapting growing it. for instance, past year, saw two films horror genre pari stree which starred big-time artists like anushka sharma former rajkumar rao latter. both them did well, no, actors get typecast either.

results.title: Spotlight: Kangana Ranaut
results.content: call her queen, datto, simran manikarnika, the feisty daring kangana ranaut has created own glorious niche bollywood. onscreen she enkindles pure magic offscreen roars like lioness that sets everyone straight with no-filter attitude. apart from being wooed by exquisite fashion sense, media often talking about controversial statements are more than not absolutely on point. most of us already have an idea who as person boss lady! but instead statements, letâ€™s put some kickass inspirational under bright spotlight to get clearer picture three-time national award winner really is. coming manali, himachal pradesh, was brought up simple environment, place where movie theatre nowhere vicinity. naive small-town girl strived through debut film gangster at budding age 19 made initial mark bollywood, simplicity shined on. â€œin 2007, when won best debutant for gangster, had what red carpet police was, so my head, thought iâ€™d go would weddingâ€ later, we all aware, went become icon. dealt struggles career personal life utmost honesty courage. â€œitâ€™s important me be honest strugglesâ€ afraid opinionated; shares perspective world. â€œi will continue say feel, could right wrong because it fundamental should exercise it.â€ popular interview rajat sharma aaj ki adalat, also mentioned keep experimenting characters much possible. donâ€™t want associated done-and-dusted roles, itâ€™s new era films our industry time project better too.â€ love cinema knows bound empowering see play strong-headed, feminist roles inspire youth. â€œsometimes tend take liberty injecting these little things (nuances relating feminism) characters.â€ known rebellious nature. stubbornness follow dreams ambitions almost infectious. either stop rebel, another optionâ€ thereâ€™s lot learn woman valour charge, do compromise, going strong, believe your let truth prevail. only stand truth, far managed well.â€ ranautâ€™s next â€˜mental hai kyaâ€™ rajkumar rao comedy thriller set release march, looking its posters can tell chartbuster. hail queen!

results.title: Top 3 Character artists in Bollywood
results.content: character artists like pran, anupam kher paresh rawal laid the foundation for recent stars irfan khan, nawazuddin siddiqui pankaj tripathi, proving that most movies would be nothing without their strong brilliant performances add an edge to various storylines. while movie may never remembered solely these gems, we know talent passion makes characters live on forever. they can play friendly, philosophical, romantic, hilarious, sensitive downright despicable roles, but one common element outstanding performers bring our screens versatility. call them subordinates, sidekicks supporting actors, are incomplete dynamic acts weâ€™re here give journey big shoutout have made indian cinema what it today. pran kewal sikand, known by mononym chanced upon acting career 1940. after brief struggle, he scored his bollywood debut ziddi. gained popularity lean mean roles ram aur shyam, milan, heer ranjha, kashmir ki kali more. evil so believable people stopped naming kids â€œpranâ€. was only beginning of reign, with upkar 1967 broke villain typecast playing positive emotional role set him free. zanjeer, don, majboor, naseeb, amar akbar anthony karz few examples followed. played grey somehow were heroic own way. gambler who turns into mechanic family man helps criminals save wife possessive caretaker conceals grave secret chameleon! worked 600+ skyrocketing outlasted careers many superstars dilip kumar, dev anand, amitabh bachchan, rishi kapoor, etc. reportedly paid more than protagonists early 1970s due seniority industry. during casting bobby, raj kapoor couldn’t afford then agreed do film signing amount re 1. once stated, if reincarnation exists, heâ€™d born as all over again. shimla 1955 inclined towards at young age. gold medal theatre department college, sent national school drama. thereafter future seemed bright fledgeling actor struggled drama teacher lucknow mumbai until saaransh via mahesh bhatt. old even though 28 year time truly recognised seamless portrayal. much so, offered around 100 within 10 days its release. itâ€™s been rollercoaster ever since, goes up! versatility, terrorist called dr.dang karma, drunk father tezaab, supportive best friend lamhe, father/best ddlj, hilarious college principal kuch hota hai, naive haseena maan jayegi, criminal business tycoon kaho na pyaar competitive lawyer veer zaara, responsible police agent wednesday, timid con special 26 lately former pm manmohan singh accidental prime minister. mind you, favourite amongst kherâ€™s 400+ films. stage artist, veteran actor, tv host now prominent hollywood has starred oscar-nominated silver linings playbook, hit netflix show sense currently working american series new amsterdam. oh also runs mumbai. love across borders accolades touched sky. need say more? 1950 age 12, had already decided pursue career. support from principals, took part festivals later joined living. being natural earlier stuck between doing parallel commercial eventually found ground both. negative first arjun, naam, lakhan, sir more; andaz apna where plays double both strict brother aka tejaa, stand out. always mixed humour special. â€œmain tejaa hu, mark idhar haiâ€ iconic dialogue lover forget! legendary comic inspector mohra, inquisitive neighbour judaai, funny uncle mr & mrs khiladi breaks fourth wall gives updates news reporter(class act!), nosy chachi 420, sharp security guard jayegi(â€œjo chacha hai wahi bhatija hai…â€) 2000 came biggest hera pheri won number awards baburao whoâ€™s comical dialogues mannerisms left audience fits laughter. stream priyadarshan films each other couldâ€™ve done justice those masterpieces. hungama, malamaal weekly, chup ke bhool bhulaiya top picks list. did continue serious aitraaz, atheist my god! recently sunil dutt sanju plus vital advisor uri, creating â€˜joshâ€™. which us wonder, there anything canâ€™t pull off? years, actors tripathi taking centre loved do. joining club debutant siddhanth chaturvedi mc sher latest release gully boy brought forth strongly ranveer singhâ€™s murad, term â€œsupporting actorâ€ dissolved just â€œactorâ€ now.
